item.title: Rhythmic Running and the Disconnected State
item.description:
Rhythmic Running and the Disconnected State

Rhythmic Running is a new idea. A new way of endurance conditioning where your mind and body are disconnected and yet completely still and aware. You will come to understand in this short 50 page book how to control your thoughts and minimize the pain of distance running by breathing, counting and using the included Rhythmic Running beads as focal points to distract you from the negative perspective your mind has a habit of creating around you.

item.title: How to Meditate - How to Meditate
item.description:
How to Meditate - How to Meditate

With the hectic pace and demands of modern life, many people feel stressed and over-worked. It often feels like there is just not enough time in the day to get everything done. Our stress and tiredness make us unhappy, impatient and frustrated. It can even affect our health.

item.title: Set goals and hit them Everytime
